function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Infectious routines of the COVID-19 virus are respiratory and close contact, increasing the risk of transmission in spatialized environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 spread due to close contact and lack of social distancing.","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures and the use of personal protective equipment (PPE).","Technologies":"Use of automation and robotics for unmanned distribution of living materials.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in spatialized environments.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, government agencies, and organizations responsible for implementing social distancing measures."},{"Description":"Delay of transmission and information loss in de-spatialized environments, impacting the experience of tele-operation.","Impact":"Increased risk of bad experiences and operational inefficiencies in de-spatialized tasks.","Mitigation":"Use of advanced communication technologies and high-speed internet to reduce transmission delay and information loss.","Technologies":"Advanced communication technologies, high-speed internet, and tele-operation systems.","People":"Remote workers, telecommuters, and individuals involved in de-spatialized tasks.","Owner":"Technology companies, telecommunication providers, and organizations leveraging tele-operation systems."},{"Description":"Potential risk of exposure to infectious diseases in tele-surgery due to the involvement of remote doctors.","Impact":"Increased risk of potential exposure to contagious diseases for the operators and patients during tele-surgery.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict infection control measures, use of advanced sterilization techniques, and regular testing of remote doctors.","Technologies":"Advanced sterilization techniques, remote monitoring systems, and infection control technologies.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, and individuals involved in tele-surgery.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, regulatory bodies, and organizations responsible for ensuring safe tele-surgery practices."}]}
